metadata.name: Proxy Execution Via Wuauclt.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the use of the Windows Update Client binary (wuauclt.exe) for proxy execution.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wuauclt.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('wuauclt.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('updatedeploymentprovider')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('runhandlercomserver')) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /updatedeploymentprovider updatedeploymentprovider.dll ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' wuaueng.dll ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\uus\\packages\\preview\\amd64\\updatedeploy.dll /classid')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\uus\\amd64\\updatedeploy.dll /classid')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\winsxs\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\updatedeploy.dll /classid '))))

output.summary: Detects the use of the Windows Update Client binary (wuauclt.exe) for proxy execution.
